extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game

        public void setReleaseMode(boolean releaseMode)
        Set release mode. Release mode increases challenge delays to proper values. Default is false.
        Parameters:
        releaseMode - true to enable release mode

      • completeChallenge

        public void completeChallenge(Challenge chl,
                              boolean skipped)
        Complete the given active challenge. Checks if the challenge is valid, i.e. if it's one of the currently active challenges.
        Parameters:
        chl - challenge to complete
        skipped - whether challenge was skipped
